{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Ubiquiti Networks Edgerouter ER-8.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Ubiquiti EdgeMAX EdgeRouter (ER-8) |caption2 = 8-Port Router (Rack 19") |pp = https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter/ |sp = https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/categories/200321064-EdgeMAX |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Ubiquiti_Networks_EdgeRouter |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = EdgeRouter |submodelappend = yes |submodel = ER-8 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/20/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Ubiquiti_Networks_EdgeRouter_(ER-8) |series = EdgeRouter |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN6120; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON II |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 600 / 800 MHz / 1 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDIN7DP2-4G; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX29LV640ETTI-70G; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;KVR16S11S6/2; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;B50280C1;B50280C1KFBG; |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B4:FB:E4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2012.04.01;; |stockos = Linux;4.9.79-UBNT;Debian 9;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 1.5 |pwr_conn = C5 |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = metal case, fan, heatsink, |addchip = 16Mbit SPI Serial Flash;cFeon;QH16-104HIP;;1;,,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, 3-State Quad Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;74LVC125A;;5;,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;4;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;4;,,, 1MHz, 2.0A, Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;5;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Unisonic Tech;UT4392G;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;CYStech Electronics;MTB11N03Q8;;1;,,, PCIe 3.0 Clock Generator with 1 HCSL Outputs;Pericom;P16C557;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = ubnt |defaultpass = ubnt |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAHSBBCW9732 |asin = B00IA5M2AS |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 'EDGE_ROUTER_PRO (NO SFP)' is silkscreened on the board.
{{seealso|Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Series}}
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.ui.com/downloads/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_DS.pdf Datasheet] *[https://www.ui.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeOS_UG.pdf User's Guide] *[https://www.ui.com/downloads/qsg/ER-8/ Quick Start Guide]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/ubiquiti/ubiquiti_edgerouter_er-8 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/ubiquiti/edgerouter |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = octeon |subtarget = generic |arch = mips64_octeon |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |image_too_big = 17.01.6 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==See also== ===Model Comparison=== :[[Ubiquiti Networks]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/comparison/ EdgeMAX Model Comparison] *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 4 (ER-4)]] - e300 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7130 @1GHz ''Octeon III'' (Quad Core MIPS64) :Ports: 3x GbE, 1x SFP, 1x USB 3.0; Performance: 3.4Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter 6P (ER-6P)]] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN7130 @1GHz ''Octeon III'' (Quad Core MIPS64) :Ports: 5x GbE, 1x SFP, 1x USB 3.0; Performance: 3.4Mpps :PoE Support: 5x 24V passive 2-pair/4-pair PoE *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter PRO]] (ERPro-8) - e200 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN6120 @1GHz ''Octeon II'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: (6+2)x GbE, 2x SFP, 1x USB 2.0; Performance: 1.8Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter (ER-8)]] - e200 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN6120 @800MHz ''Octeon II'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: (6+2)x GbE, 1x USB 2.0; Performance: 1.8Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter LITE]] (ERLite-3) - e110 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5020 @500MHz ''Octeon +'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: 3x GbE, 1x USB 2.0, Console; Performance: 0.7Mpps *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter POE]] (ERPoe-5) - e110 :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5020 @500MHz ''Octeon +'' (Dual Core MIPS64) :Ports: 5x GbE, 1x USB 2.0, Console; Performance: 0.7Mpps :PoE Support: 5x 24V/48V/Passive 2-pair/4-pair PoE
*[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Security Gateway]] (USG) - e100 *[[Ubiquiti Networks UniFi Security Gateway Pro]] (USG-PRO-4) *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X]] (ER-X)/(ER-X-SFP) - e50 :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz (Dual Core MIPS1004KEc) :Ports: 5x GbE, 2x PoE (in/out), (1x SFP); Performance: 1.4Mpps :*[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter X SFP]] (ER-X-SFP) - e50 *[[Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Infinity (ER-8-XG)]] • [https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-infinity/ PPage] :CPU: [[Cavium]] [https://cavium.com/octeon-III-CN73XX-CN72XX-mips64-processors.html CN7360] @1.8GHz ''Octeon III'' (16x Core MIPS64) :8-Port 10G SFP+ Router (80Gbps), 4GB Flash, 16GB DDR4 RAM :Ports: 1x GbE, 8x SFP, 1x USB 3.0, Console; Performance: 18Mpps
